extendedInfo.description: Create a 360 panorama in only one shot!Capture all your surrounding with only one shot of a reflective Christmas Ball or any reflective rounded shape.Wave the device around you to experience the gyro viewing mode.Share the resulting 360 panorama by email, Facebook or Twitter.360 Ball is the only app to produce a spherical panorama using only one picture without any dedicated equipment. Look around you and search for a reflective round object. A silver teapot or even a ladle would do the magic.For high quality results, you may use a yard globe (gazing globe or garden ball) or a half mirror light bulb.You can also use this app to view any spherical panorama available in your camera roll.A few links to get your light bulb:http://www.lightbulbemporium.com/bulbrite_712312_25g16hm.asphttps://www.divinelighting.com/bulbrite-100g25hm-half-chrome-100w-globe-shape-bulb-p-22740.htmlhttp://1000bulbs.com/product/669/DEC-100597.htmlhttp://www.1800lighting.com/Bulbrite/item.cfm?itemsku=40G16HMhttp://www.buylighting.com/25-Watt-G16-Globe-Half-Mirror-Candelabra-Base-p/b712312.htmhttp://www.lightbulbdistrict.com/incandescent-bulbs/half-mirror-silver-bowl-bulbs/half-mirror-bulbs/a19-half-mirror-bulbs/60a-sl.htmlhttp://www.elightbulbs.com/Bulbrite-712312-25G16HM-Silver-Bowl-Light-Bulbhttp://www.amazon.com/40-Watt-Silver-Medium-Incandescent/dp/B001PIAU38/ref=sr_1_18?ie=UTF8&qid=1362504013&sr=8-18&keywords=silver+bowl+bulb

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Coolest thing ever!!!!!  Nothing else like it so far that I found on Google play.  So unique and fun to play with.  Well worth downloading.  Just wondering if they will be adding any filters to the app - will write and ask developer.  This app works in both of my devices - asus infinity TF700T (jelly bean 4.1.1 quad core tablet) and Samsung galaxy player 4.0 (gingerbread 2.3.5 dual core).
reviews.author: Toni Cz
